var accessLevelsList = accessLevels.split(','); var singleOwnerRecords = []; var lowAccessLevelRecords = []; var needApproval = false; for (var i = 0; i < accessLevelsList.length; i++) { needApproval = false; var accessLevelGr = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_alertsnowp_access_levels'); if (accessLevelGr.get(accessLevelsList[i])) { var count = 0; var gr = new GlideAggregate('x_aleen_alertsnowp_area_owners'); gr.addQuery('access_level_id', accessLevelGr.access_level_id); gr.addAggregate('COUNT'); gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { count = gr.getAggregate('COUNT'); } if (count == 0) { if (accessLevelGr.criticality == "LOW") { if (lowAccessLevelRecords.length > 0) { lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['access_level_id'] = lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['access_level_id'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_id; lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['access_level_name'] = lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['access_level_name'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_name; lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['sourceid'] = lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['sourceid'] + "###" + accessLevelGr.sourceid; } else { var lmap = {}; lmap['access_level_id'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_id; lmap['access_level_name'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_name; lmap['sourceid'] = accessLevelGr.sourceid; lowAccessLevelRecords.push(lmap); } } else { needApproval = true; foundIndex = -1; for (var icv = 0; icv < singleOwnerRecords.length; icv++) { if (singleOwnerRecords[icv]['approver'] === "DEFAULT") { foundIndex = icv; break; } } if (foundIndex > -1) { singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['access_level_id'] = singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['access_level_id'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_id; singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['access_level_name'] = singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['access_level_name'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_name; singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['sourceid'] = singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['sourceid'] + "###" + accessLevelGr.sourceid; } else { var mapa = {}; mapa['approver'] = "DEFAULT"; mapa['access_level_id'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_id; mapa['access_level_name'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_name; mapa['sourceid'] = accessLevelGr.sourceid; singleOwnerRecords.push(mapa); } } } else { needApproval = true; } if (count == 1) { var grAO = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_alertsnowp_area_owners'); grAO.addQuery('access_level_id', accessLevelGr.access_level_id); grAO.query(); while (grAO.next()) { var refSysUser = grAO.owner.getRefRecord(); var approverID = refSysUser.sys_id; indexFound = -1; for (var icx = 0; icx < singleOwnerRecords.length; icx++) { var mmpa = singleOwnerRecords[icx]; if (mmpa['approver'] == approverID) { indexFound = icx; break; } } if (indexFound > -1) { singleOwnerRecords[indexFound]['access_level_id'] = singleOwnerRecords[indexFound]['access_level_id'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_id; singleOwnerRecords[indexFound]['access_level_name'] = singleOwnerRecords[indexFound]['access_level_name'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_name; singleOwnerRecords[indexFound]['sourceid'] = singleOwnerRecords[indexFound]['sourceid'] + "###" + accessLevelGr.sourceid; } else { var map = {}; map['approver'] = approverID; map['access_level_id'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_id; map['access_level_name'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_name; map['sourceid'] = accessLevelGr.sourceid; singleOwnerRecords.push(map); } } } if (count > 1) { var buildingAccessTask = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_alertsnowp_building_access_task'); buildingAccessTask.access_level_id = accessLevelGr.access_level_id; buildingAccessTask.access_level_name = accessLevelGr.access_level_name; buildingAccessTask.sourceid = accessLevelGr.sourceid; buildingAccessTask.needapproval = needApproval; buildingAccessTask.parent_number = current.number; buildingAccessTask.access_end_date = current.access_end_date; buildingAccessTask.access_start_date = current.access_start_date; buildingAccessTask.request_for = current.request_for; buildingAccessTask.notes = current.notes; buildingAccessTask.reason = current.reason; buildingAccessTask.sys_created_on = new GlideDateTime(); buildingAccessTask.sys_updated_on = new GlideDateTime(); buildingAccessTask.insert(); } } } for (var icc = 0; icc < singleOwnerRecords.length; icc++) { var mapva = singleOwnerRecords[icc]; var buildingAccTask = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_alertsnowp_building_access_task'); buildingAccTask.access_level_id = mapva['access_level_id']; buildingAccTask.access_level_name = mapva['access_level_name']; buildingAccTask.sourceid = mapva['sourceid']; buildingAccTask.needapproval = true; buildingAccTask.parent_number = current.number; buildingAccTask.access_end_date = current.access_end_date; buildingAccTask.access_start_date = current.access_start_date; buildingAccTask.request_for = current.request_for; buildingAccTask.notes = current.notes; buildingAccTask.reason = current.reason; buildingAccTask.sys_created_on = new GlideDateTime(); buildingAccTask.sys_updated_on = new GlideDateTime(); buildingAccTask.insert(); singleOwnerRecords.splice(icc, 1); --icc; } for (var iccl = 0; iccl < lowAccessLevelRecords.length; iccl++) { var mapval = lowAccessLevelRecords[iccl]; var lowbuildingAccTask = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_alertsnowp_building_access_task'); lowbuildingAccTask.access_level_id = mapval['access_level_id']; lowbuildingAccTask.access_level_name = mapval['access_level_name']; lowbuildingAccTask.sourceid = mapval['sourceid']; lowbuildingAccTask.needapproval = false; lowbuildingAccTask.parent_number = current.number; lowbuildingAccTask.access_end_date = current.access_end_date; lowbuildingAccTask.access_start_date = current.access_start_date; lowbuildingAccTask.request_for = current.request_for; lowbuildingAccTask.notes = current.notes; lowbuildingAccTask.reason = current.reason; lowbuildingAccTask.sys_created_on = new GlideDateTime(); lowbuildingAccTask.sys_updated_on = new GlideDateTime(); lowbuildingAccTask.insert(); lowAccessLevelRecords.splice(iccl, 1); --iccl; } })(inputs, outputs);
